targets.query: SELECT mean("total_power") FROM "DomainEnvStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$ucs_domain$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "domain"
SELECT meanValues + $average_ucs_domain_total_power FROM (SELECT (mean("total_power") - mean("total_power"))  as meanValues  FROM "DomainEnvStats"  GROUP BY time($__interval))
SELECT meanValues + $average_ucs_domain_total_power FROM (SELECT (mean("total_power") - mean("total_power"))  as meanValues  FROM "DomainEnvStats"  GROUP BY time($__interval))

panels.title: $ucs_domain ucs domain average total power consumption (per domain)

targets.query: SELECT mean("total_power") FROM "FIEnvStats" WHERE ("fi_id" =~ /^$fabric_interconnect$/ AND "domain" =~ /^$ucs_domain$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "fi_id", "domain" fill(null)
SELECT meanValues + $average_fi_total_power FROM (SELECT (mean("total_power") - mean("total_power"))  as meanValues  FROM "FIEnvStats"  GROUP BY time($__interval))
SELECT mean("total_power") FROM "ChassisEnv" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$ucs_domain$/ AND "chassis_id" =~ /^$chassis$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "/^$chassis$/" fill(none)
SELECT meanValues + $average_chassis_total_power FROM (SELECT (mean("total_input_power") - mean("total_input_power"))  as meanValues  FROM "ChassisEnv"  GROUP BY time($__interval))

SELECT mean("power_consumed") FROM "Servers" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$ucs_domain$/ AND "id" =~ /^$servers$/ AND "chassis" =~ /^$chassis$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "domain", "id", "chassis"
SELECT meanValues + $average_server_total_power FROM (SELECT (mean("power_consumed") - mean("power_consumed"))  as meanValues  FROM "Servers"  GROUP BY time($__interval))

list.definition: select (domain) from (SELECT last("model") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIEnvStats" GROUP BY domain)
list.name: ucs_domain
list.query: select (domain) from (SELECT last("model") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIEnvStats" GROUP BY domain)

list.definition: select (fi_id) from (SELECT last("model") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIEnvStats" GROUP BY fi_id)
list.name: fabric_interconnect
list.query: select (fi_id) from (SELECT last("model") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIEnvStats" GROUP BY fi_id)

list.definition: select (chassis_id) from (SELECT last("total_input_power") FROM "$db"."$rp"."ChassisEnv" WHERE "domain" =~ /^$ucs_domain$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY chassis_id)
list.name: chassis
list.query: select (chassis_id) from (SELECT last("total_input_power") FROM "$db"."$rp"."ChassisEnv" WHERE "domain" =~ /^$ucs_domain$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY chassis_id)

list.definition: select id from (SELECT last("model") FROM "$db"."$rp"."Servers" WHERE "domain"=~ /^$ucs_domain$/ GROUP BY domain,chassis,type,id)
list.name: servers
list.query: select id from (SELECT last("model") FROM "$db"."$rp"."Servers" WHERE "domain"=~ /^$ucs_domain$/ GROUP BY domain,chassis,type,id)

list.definition: show tag values from "$db"."$rp"."Servers" with key=location
list.label: Location
list.name: location
list.query: show tag values from "$db"."$rp"."Servers" with key=location

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES CARDINALITY FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIEnvStats" WITH KEY=location
list.name: num_locations
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES CARDINALITY FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIEnvStats" WITH KEY=location

list.definition: SELECT  MEAN(("total_input_power")) FROM "ChassisEnv" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$ucs_domain$/ AND "chassis_id" =~ /^$chassis$/)  AND $timeFilter
list.name: average_chassis_total_power
list.query: SELECT  MEAN(("total_input_power")) FROM "ChassisEnv" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$ucs_domain$/ AND "chassis_id" =~ /^$chassis$/)  AND $timeFilter

list.definition: SELECT  MEAN(("total_power")) FROM "FIEnvStats" WHERE ("fi_id" =~ /^$fabric_interconnect$/ AND "domain" =~ /^$ucs_domain$/)  AND $timeFilter
list.name: average_fi_total_power
list.query: SELECT  MEAN(("total_power")) FROM "FIEnvStats" WHERE ("fi_id" =~ /^$fabric_interconnect$/ AND "domain" =~ /^$ucs_domain$/)  AND $timeFilter

list.definition: SELECT  MEAN(("power_consumed")) FROM "Servers" WHERE "domain" =~ /^$ucs_domain$/  AND "id" =~ /^$servers$/ AND "chassis" =~ /^$chassis$/ AND $timeFilter
list.name: average_server_total_power
list.query: SELECT  MEAN(("power_consumed")) FROM "Servers" WHERE "domain" =~ /^$ucs_domain$/  AND "id" =~ /^$servers$/ AND "chassis" =~ /^$chassis$/ AND $timeFilter
